channel.title: Submitting Packages :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: What you should do before submitting packages You should register in the Salix-main mailing list. All development discussions are taking place there. What packages to submit Feel free to submit packages for any open source software you like. Replacing Slackware packages is generally not accepted, unless there is a really important reason. You can also package proprietary software, provided re-distribution of that software is allowed (like for example the opera web browser).
